billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

title: Increase penalties for the use of a fake ID and requires a pin from the DMV to obtain a duplicate or amended license via the internet
summary: Increases the penalties imposed on a person under the age of twenty-one years to purchase or attempt to purchase an alcoholic beverage through the use of fake ID's; establishes fines, jail and license suspension; requires a personal identification number for individuals applying for a duplicate or amended license or permit through the department of motor vehicles website.
